overview: Jeanet, an insecure middle-aged woman, discovers one day that rabbit ears are growing out of her head. Shocked and confused, she rushes to the doctor to get rid of her ailment. But the doctor turns out to be a poor listener. Jeanets relatives  seem to have attention for her. Jeanet thinks she is on her own until she knocks on her husband's door.
title: Sweet Rabbit
